Text: Comment on quality please? Is this real?

What's the 
Audio bit rate? Is it lossless dts-hd
What's the video res? Is it untouched 1080?

If you wondered, what is the difference between this and AMiABLE's version, I made a couple of comparison screens:

The.Amazing.Spider-Man.2012.1080p.BluRay.X264-AMiABLE [PublicHD] (Size: 9.84 GiB)
http://i.imgur.com/ChEN7.jpg

The Amazing Spider-Man 2012 1080p Blu-ray Remux AVC DTS-HD MA 5.1 - KRaLiMaRKo (Size: 26.88 GiB)
http://i.imgur.com/uHupM.jpg

For me, there is no difference at all. So it's better to download the 10 GiB version.

If it's truly DTS-HD then there's a HUGE difference (and this would be the one worth downloading).

(That assumes you can play DTS-HD, of course).
Careful, it's got Cinavia codes on it...
